item.description:
• Spotify Lyrics are fixed again!
  • New Lyric Search Window
  • Complete code redesign
  • Apple Music fix (can get Spotify lyrics, can convert romanized song metadata back to original, so NetEase lyrics work)
  • App can get LRCLIB and NetEase lyrics even if Spotify fails
  • Code redesign (bugs fixed)
  • New Liquid Glass main window
  • Can control volume from window
  • Get rid of flicker on lyric change in karaoke window
  • Better status on translation (can see if translation is loading)
  • Better NetEase lyric search to prevent incorrect lyrics
  • AirPlay audio delay support
